title: Pet Friendly Hotel Key West | Barkbox at the Key West Hotel
sub_title: A dog friendly hotel in Key West, Gates offers these extra amenities and services to guest pet owners
seo_description: The Gates Hotel Key West is not only a pet friendly hotel, our Barkbox partnership features special pet amenities and services in our Key West Hotel.
short_description: To ensure your furry jet-setter has an unforgettable stay we have partnered with BarkBox who has curated a special welcome box of irresistible gourmet treats and toys promising hours of entertainment.
contents_1:
A dog friendly hotel in Key West

To ensure your furry jet-setter has an unforgettable stay we have partnered with BarkBox who has curated a special welcome box of irresistible gourmet treats and toys promising hours of entertainment.
contents_2:
Gates offers these extra amenities and services to guest pet owners:

  • Plush dog bed
  • Water bowl and fresh water
  • Map of Key West highlighting dog-friendly spots
  • Dog walking services available upon request

 

BarkBox carefully selects products and presents for your dog, some of which include: toys, bones and all-natural treats, hygiene products, and innovative new gadgets.
